text:
"Gangnam Style" () is a song by PSY. The music video has been watched over 3.2 billion times on YouTube. It is the first video in the website's history that more than 1 billion people have seen. It has made people make many videos like it but in other locations, named "parodies". Barack Obama, David Cameron, and Ban Ki-moon tried the song's dance moves.
Gangnam Style continued to be the most viewed YouTube video until August 4th 2017, months since the music video for Despacito was first released.
